resources.string: Yes, hrrmmm. You a space gem I give. Your memories store it will help.
To make a vegan burger you have. A patty from beans or lentils should make. Recipes online you find and choose one you will. Yes, hrrmmm.
Scrambled tofu for breakfast make. Lots of seasoning and herbs use.. Hmm.
I sense the dark side in you. You are tempted to give in. You will make pancakes to give yourself some comfort. Flax egg you should use. Yes.
Make Thai summer rolls you must. Rice paper wrapper you should use.
Tacos today make. Beans and walnuts instead of meat use. Hrmmm.
A pizza today with nutritional yeast instead of cheese we will make. A vegan pizza dough you can use, if you must. Yes, hrrmmm.
For this challenge, sushi you will make. Fried eggplant or zucchini instead of salmon you will use. Yes.
Hrrmmm. Challenging this one is. Make a mezze platter you must. Hummus form scratch you will make. Yes. Various vegetables you can use. Hrrmmm.
Wraps today will be. You will fill them with falafels and vegetables. Vegan wraps you must buy and on falafel recipe decide.
Pasta pesto you will make. Pick the type of pasta you can, but pesto yourself must make. Cashews and herbs use. Yes, hrrmmm.
